featured.text: As a teenager, Cartier-Bresson rebelled against his parents’ formal ways of education.
Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.
In what way are high school proms significant to American teenagers?
The purchasing power of teenagers has been decreasing over the years.

other.text: In the 1980s, proms were held in local churches for teenagers to attend.
To find who are the most stressed out teenagers.
They are important events for teenagers to learn social skills.
Many teenagers make a lot of profits in the fashion market today.

definition.zh_def: 青少年，通常指年齡在13至19歲之間的年輕人。
definition.en_def: A person aged between 13 and 19 years old.
definition.example: The teenager spent the summer volunteering at the local animal shelter.
